page.title: 13Road Hazards
page.content: Many of the roads in the area have a very high accident rate. There are many minor accidents on the roundabouts, where drivers are not hurt but cars just get slightly damaged. On the Ring Road there has been several fatal accidents where the dual carriageway and single carriageways meet. Recently a six year old boy was killed on this road. He managed to get through a hole in the fence which had been erected to stop people being able to get onto the road. Popley Way is an "accident blackspot" and many people have been killed either as pedestrains, cyclists or motor cyclists. A section of ther A340 as it passes through the village is particularly dangerous as drivers tend to drive too fast round the sharp bends and often come off the road, damaging property and themselves.
